name: Kingdom Slayer Final Final
description:
Kingdom Slayer is a game about a high school boy named Tim who is always playing a video game called 'Kingdom Slayer.' One day while Tim is playing, he somehow opens a portal that sucks him into his television and into the game itself. Tim is faced with a challenge to help save the village of Tarwell by defeating the evil King Sobar & a dragon, and also to find a way back home to reality.

You, as the player, will be playing as Tim and will make decisions to help him get back home. This game shows what it is like to actually play video games. You get so involved in the characters, the setting, the plot that it seems like you've been sucked into the game.

Will Tim accept the challenge to help Tarwell? Will he defeat King Sobar and the dragon? Will he ever make it back home? It's your decision! Choose wisely….
